Description: Matches any set of characters enclosed
Matches any letter from (a to z) or (A to Z) or (0 to 9)
Signals a special sequence and can also be used as an escape special character
Matches anyone character (except newline)
Anchor; Matches at the start of the string
Anchor; Matches at the end of the string
Greed and Repetition:  Checks for zero or more characters to its left.
Greed and Repetition: Checks for one or more characters to its left.
Repetition: Repeat at least x times but no more than y times.
Match either or
Matches the pattern of characters specified in the parenthesis exactly.
Matches any single letter, digit or underscore.
Matches any character the string DOES NOT contain any word characters
Matches a single whitespace character like: space, newline, tab, return.
Matches where the string DOES NOT contain a white space character
Matches tab.
Matches newline.
Matches return.
Matches decimal digit 0-9.
Matches only the beginning or end of the word.
